ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 285
ygData.msgSnippet: Well Abashi (Gordon) never knows what he is talking about 99% of the time as it is.  And that is a fact. ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Well Abashi (Gordon) never knows what he is talking about 99% of the time as
it is. And that is a fact.

----- Original Message -----
From: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 10, 2000 4:48 AM
Subject: Digest Number 285


> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> eGroups members: $60 in FREE calls! Join beMANY!

> ------------------------------------------------------------------------

> There is 1 message in this issue.
>
> Topics in this digest:
>
> 1. Flaming and the thermal cloak
> From: "Dave Barrett" <djbarret@...>
>
>
> ________________________________________________________________________
> ________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 1
> Date: Fri, 09 Jun 2000 11:46:31 -0000
> From: "Dave Barrett" <djbarret@...>
> Subject: Flaming and the thermal cloak
>
> 1) Please keep your silly flames off this board. I was excited to
> see
> that there were 8 items in the summary post that got emailed to me,
> and disappointed that 7 of them were just you people calling each
> other names.
>
> 2) I believe that we were told specifically by Abashi that the
> 'Tattered Gnomish Cloak' was not in fact in the game in any form. I
> would not waste any resources trying to create the thermal cloak
> until
> we've been told by Verant that they're actively working on the
> tinkering skill. Especially given the info received by the anon. GM
> over at Fulcrum's site about the personal heater being a red herring.
> The time frame was 'after poison.' Poison is slated to be fixed by
> the end of June - I'm not gonna worry about new tinkering items until
> July at the earliest.
>
> Just wanted to save you folks some effort in case you missed the
> abashi quote the first time around.
>
> Llabak Tharr of CoR
> 35 Mage and Master beggar, brewer and tinker
> T Marr
>
>
